snippet: Dr. Fredric Cogan, who runs a clinic on the Belmont Park backstretch, treats hot walkers, grooms, exercise riders, assistant trainers and barn night-watchmen, and he tends to many complaints peculiar to a racetrack, like horse bites, rat bites and...
abstract: Dr. Fredric Cogan, who runs a clinic on the Belmont Park backstretch, treats hot walkers, grooms, exercise riders, assistant trainers and barn night-watchmen, and he tends to many complaints peculiar to a racetrack, like horse bites, rat bites and broken jaws from being hit by a thoroughbred's swinging head.

headline.main: At Belmont, a Doctor Gets Track Workers Back on Their Feet
